title: RIOT is a dogshit company
body:
Getting a 14-day suspension for saying %%%%%% has to be the most dogshit thing when it comes to not allowing players to play. This is literally the reason why League of Legends is shit compared to DotA 2. You can say whatever you want in DotA, cause it's clearly the superior game.

Don't believe me? Look at the prize pool for DotA TI.. last year 24 million dollars, compared to League which is like what 2 mill? 3 mill? LOL HAAHAHAHA

Yeah. Keep your dogshit game LOL.
